channel.title: Entertainment News
channel.description: Let's start watching! CableTV.com keeps you informed of all entertainment news.

item.title: How To Watch Army Black Knights Football in 2025

item.content:encoded: On, brave old Army team! Our Army football viewing guide features the complete 2025 TV schedule, plus channel listings and streaming recommendations.

item.title: How To Watch the 2025 CFL Season

item.content:encoded: Are you curious about watching the Canadian Football League (CFL) this season? Our viewing guide highlights the best TV plans for experiencing the Great White North’s finest gridiron action.

item.content:encoded: If you are a soccer fan, don’t miss our lineup of the best TV providers you need to catch all the matches from your team. Score some inside information here!

item.title: How To Watch Tennessee Volunteers Football in 2025
item.dc:creator: Taylor Kujawa
item.content:encoded: Go Vols! Here’s how to watch Tennessee football all season long. Our guide has the complete 2025 TV schedule, channel listings, and our top streaming pick.
